title.narrative: Output 3.4 Les stratégies d’intervention en situation d’urgence sont renforcées et les services de base d'Eau, d'Assainissement et d'Hygiène sont assurés aux populations sinistrées.
Affected population provided with temporary access to safe water (aquatabs, chlorine)
Number of severely malnourished children and their caretaker who receive hygiene kits and hygiene awareness raising
Affected population provided with access to safe water (construction/ rehabilitation)
Health/nutrition centers equipped with appropriate WASH facilities (latrines, hand washing stations, water supply)
Affected population provided with HH water treatment and storage material, key hygiene supplies and sensitised on key hygiene messages
